identity.name: Espaço Sow - Internal Dashboard
identity.description: A clean, mobile-first internal tool for salon assistants. Replaces chaotic notes with structured, calming UI.

usage.primary: Main actions, active states, key icons
usage.secondary: Backgrounds for secondary cards, muted buttons

layout_strategies.container: max-w-md mx-auto min-h-screen bg-background shadow-2xl overflow-hidden relative

buttons.secondary: bg-white text-foreground border border-border hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground

cards.style: bg-card rounded-2xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm p-5

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-xl bg-secondary/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:bg-white transition-all

navigation.style: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-white/90 backdrop-blur-lg border-t border-border p-4 flex justify-around items-center z-50

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Mobile App' feel by constraining the main view to 'max-w-md mx-auto' on desktop, centered with a shadow.
Use 'lucide-react' for all icons. Pick thin, elegant strokes.
The Home Screen should be a 'Bento Grid' of the 4 main modules: Clientes Novos, Cetim, Depilação, Estoque.
Use 'sonner' for all notifications (stock alerts, success messages).
Data persistence: Use localStorage as requested. Create a simple hook 'useLocalStorage' for this.
Stock Control: Use visual alerts (red border/text) when quantity < min_quantity.
Depilação: Needs a 'drag and drop' feel or simple up/down arrows to control order.
Cetim: Needs a history log view.
Clientes Novos: Needs a 'Mark as Done' toggle.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Do not use generic gradients. Use the 'subtle_mesh' defined in visual_enhancers.
Ensure all touch targets are at least 44px (h-11+).
Use 'AnimatePresence' from framer-motion for smooth page transitions if possible, or simple CSS transitions.
Never use pure black (#000000). Use the defined foreground color.
Input fields should have 'autoComplete="off"' to prevent browser clutter in this internal tool.
